PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-05492018-05-14,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN, 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-001-OC-064 - Trans Mountain Pipeline ULC (Trans Mountain)
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-001-OC-064 to vary Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity (CPCN) OC-064. This authorizes the holder of CPCN OC-064, TRANS MOUNTAIN PIPELINE ULC (Trans Mountain), to proceed with the Insurance Corporation of British Columbia Parking Lot Route Realignment.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Amending Order AO-001-OC-064 - Trans Mountain Pipeline ULC (Trans Mountain)
